name: Key Control (beanssbm)
description:
Your kingdom is made up of many important people, namely your citizens and your governments. Keep them happy, but not too happy.

Try and avoid your citizens uprising, your government replacing you, or a foreign nation invading: wouldn't want things to get too out of control.

Partially inspired by a YouTube video by CGPGrey: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rStL7niR7gs

All code here: https://github.com/BenjaminMassey/KeyControl

Sources for sound/art/etc here: https://github.com/BenjaminMassey/KeyControl/blob/master/Assets/Sources.txt
